forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 20, with temperatures rising to around 22 overnight. South wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow after 4pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 38. South southwest wind 12 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 36 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Rain then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain before 7pm. Partly cloudy. Low around 17, with temperatures rising to around 22 overnight. West wind 13 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 36 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 27. West northwest wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy blowing snow and a slight chance of snow showers. Mostly sunny. High near 33, with temperatures falling to around 31 in the afternoon. West wind around 20 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight

West wind 20 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 50 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: There was a tree down blocking most of the trail at around 3:30.  Marv, Vasili and I cleared most of it. Otherwise, the trail in the woods was great, pretty fast. No connector. Had to walk across the golf course

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: All trails power-tilled flat with a classic track and wide skate deck. Conditions are very good.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: At least 7 chairlifts, Rope Tow and Conveyor.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be power-tilled and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.comments: Pintail peak and the Big Terrain Park are now open! Only the glades are closed this morning.  Conditions should be very good today the couple of inches of snow from yesterday was tilled into the base. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food and an espresso bar. The soup of the day is navy bean and ham. NASTAR racing begins at 12:30 on Birch Run. The XC trails will be power-tilled this morning. The snowshoe trails are open. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
